title: 'They haven't found anyone else out there like me'
description: Charlotte Evans suffers from an undiagnosed condition that causes parts of her body to swell.

title: The two students who took on Coke and Pepsi
description: German friends Mirco Wiegert and Lorenz Hampl launched best-selling Fritz-Kola in 2003.

title: Penguin waddling in Broxtowe picked up by police
description: The officers were surprised to see the aquatic bird in landlocked Nottinghamshire.
